name: Endure Death's Touch
prereq: Knight Vigilant; Expert In Medium Or Heavy Armor
summary: Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away.
description:
Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away. You gain resistance 5 to physical damage and resistance 10 to negative damage against the triggering attack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on any saving throws against effects from the undead’s natural attack; if you succeed at the saving throw, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An undead hits you with an unarmed attack.
